description: Oblong octagonal board (.a) with red floral decoration and groves (two oval, one straight) for moving game pieces; metal bar at center of straight groove; 52 game pieces (.b-aaa) marked with black letters of the alphabet on red ground; game pieces may be removed from board
dimension:
1 x 13 3/8 x 8 7/8 in. (2.5 x 34 x 22.5 cm) (board)
15/16 in. (2.38 cm) (game pieces - each)
title: Game Board
